Fri.000: Finally... A little time to myself.
Sun.000: It was the previous owners who built the altar room. We aren't religious, but we let the other townsfolk use it if they want.
fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Doctor Harvey in private...$u
Tue.000: Hmm... Should I wear something special to the aerobics meet-up today?
Tue.001: You're looking really fit, Jodi! Those dumbells do wonders, don't they?
fall_25.000: It's my annual check-up today. At least I don't have to walk very far.
fall_25.001: You're here to see the doctor too? What happened?
Tue.002: Mmff... I think I've earned some cookies today. *crunch*.
winter_16.000: I'm getting all my holiday shopping done tonight! Let me know if you see Pierre coming...
